content: > this pattern is available for ** free on > my blog here 1 ** the downloadable pdf listed > for sale contains full pattern > including important notes stitch > guide written instructions chart and > complete photo-tutorial in one > printable file without advertisements a very rainbow blanket uses scheepjes metropolis pack with 80 colors however it s a perfect stash buster and can be worked with any yarn leftovers you have the pattern uses mosaic crochet with only basic stitches it can be followed either from written instruction or from charts the pattern also includes tons of progress pictures with a bit of attention and concentration you will create a bright and unique gift for yourself or your friends the blanket is adjustable and can be made in any size **level** advanced beginner **materials ** fingering yarn in 2 or many contrasting colors i used scheepjes metropolis color pack with 80 x 10g balls and one 50g vall in black shade 80 hamburg for two colored version you will need **yarn a ** 019 marseille x 9 balls **yarn b ** 024 cota x 8 balls 3 5mm hook yarn needle to weave in ends scissors 1 https //www lillabjorncrochet com/2020/11/very-rainbow-blanket html
